title: The Vayne "nerf" is honestly more of a buff
body:
~~I mean she already has one of best attack speed growths in the game. Lowering her AD by 3 and then increasing her lategame power even more, which is just a bad idea by itself already imo.~~

~~ I'm pretty sure she will have the best attack speed growth in the game after these buffs.~~

Edit: I cannot read apparently

Base attack damage lowered to 50.46 from 53.46
Attack damage growth increased to 3.5 from 3.25

/thread

replies.body: They're increasing attack damage growth, not attack speed growth.
I mean the nerf to her starting AD is definitely real. If you'd ask me to pick between that and what's live, I'd take live. Early CS is paramount.
